turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'd like to order pizzas from Bella Luna's pizzeria, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I order four medium thin-crust pizzas?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: One pizza, meat lovers with extra pepperonni and extra bacon. One veggie lovers with extra bell pepper, one supreme pizza and one cheese pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, please note that bella luna charges for extra ingrediants, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, so you have ordered 4 medium thin crust pizzas, one meatlovers with extra bacon and pepperoni, one veggie lovers with extra bell peppers, 1 supreme, and 1 cheese, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your total will be $78, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to dine-in, pick-up, or have your order delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order a order for pickup.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your pizzas will be ready in 35 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's about it. Thank you very much for your help. I really appreciate it.
